summary: An ordinance relating to land use, amending Sections 23.49.035, 23.49.048, 23.49.050, 23.49.052, 23.49.068, 23.49.070, 23.49.072, 23.49.098, 23.49.100, 23.49.102, 23.49.124, 23.49.126, 23.49.128, 23.49.152, 23.49.154, 23.84.024 and 23.84.030, and creating new Sections 23.49.033 and 3.20.320 of the Seattle Municipal Code, modifying and clarifying provisions with respect to transfer of development rights and floor area bonuses for downtown landmark performing arts theaters and low-income housing, granting priority for transfer of development rights from landmark performing arts theaters, authorizing the City TDR Bank to purchase, lease or option development rights from landmark performing arts theaters, and directing the Director of Construction and Land Use to amend the Public Benefit Features Rule.
